data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Xysticus C. L. Koch from Turkey (Araneae: Thomisidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Demir, Hakan, Topçu, Aydin, Türkeş, Tuncay (2006): A new species of the genus Xysticus C. L. Koch from Turkey (Araneae: Thomisidae). Zootaxa 1364: 45-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174745
